entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
